model_answer: The reason for the video cutting to a laptop screen showing the Wikipedia logo and URL is option B: To visually reference the website the speaker says Jimmy Wales asked him to help with before it existed.

The on-screen text "96%" appears over the snowy walking scenes likely to emphasize the statistics cited by the speaker regarding political contributions and public opinion. Option B best fits this context as it mentions the percentage of Americans wanting to reduce the influence of money in politics.
